title: Ep. 2. Here There Be Gerblins - Chapter Two
description: Our heroes’ first job is not going especially well. Taako, Merle and Magnus are hot on the trail of their employer’s kidnappers, leading them into a perilous gerblin den. Will they discover the fate of Gundren and his ward, Barry Bluejeans? Or will they find themselves held up by complicated gerblin office politics?
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
